attributes.action: Dismiss Jackie Smith for abusing  her expenses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Jackie Smith is already under scrutiny for possible abuse of her expenses claim.  How can she in any way justify making any claim for viewing videos whether pornographic in nature or not.  How long can MP's get away in referring to admin oversight and errors. Govt depts would not accept this excuse from me in similar circumstances.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Dismiss Jackie Smith for abusing her expenses"

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page19268


Prime Minister's Office
